data: So, you came here all the way from a bigger island?{break}And you lived with your parents before this?{break}Wow, that's... a really big change. Especially because you didn't even know where you were going!{break}I don't think I could have done something like that, but I wish I was that spontaneous!{break}{mood:like}How did you get the courage to fly off into the unknown like that?
{mood:happy}I would love to go on a date with you!{break}I'm free at 20:00, so I'll meet you there.

{mood:happy}Oh! Hi! You're new!{break}{mood:like}Welcome to Moonstone Island.{break}I run the shop here, and I can help you with supplies and stuff.{break}{mood:laugh}Oh, and I'm Rowan. Sorry.{break}{mood:happy}Let me know if I can help you settle in!
{mood:sad}Sorry... I'm organising the inventory that day.
Hello.{random}Oh! Hi!{random}Ah! You startled me.{random}Hey there!
I wanted to do something new!
{mood:like}I like to mix things up sometimes... how about somewhere new?

{mood:like}Hey, that's even more impressive.{break}Doing things even though they're scary? That's really cool.{break}{mood:happy}I have to say, I'm just really impressed by you.{break}{mood:laugh}It's not often you get to meet a real-life adventurer!{break}{mood:like}My life is rather mundane in comparison.{break}{mood:laugh}And as if to prove that... it's past my bedtime, I'm afraid!{break}{mood:laugh}Plus, I have to be honest, I think my social battery is drained.{break}{mood:like}But I had a really nice time. Thank you!
Bye for now!{random}Oh, I'll let you get back to it!{random}I'll stop bothering you now.{random}Bye!{random}Bye bye!

That's really cool.{break}{mood:happy}And inspiring.{break}{mood:like}Let me know if there's anything I can do to help you feel at home, okay?{break}{mood:happy}Now, I have to get home and have my night-time bath, because I am boring.{break}{mood:laugh}Plus, I have to be honest, I think my social battery is drained.{break}{mood:like}But I had a really nice time. Thank you!
{mood:like}Did you get this for me so I could go on adventures?{break}{mood:happy}That's so thoughtful! Thank you!

{mood:dislike}Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't realise.{break}Silly me. Assuming you came here by choice...{break}{mood:default}Well, that must have been hard, too.{break}I hope you manage to make this place your home.{break}{mood:sad}Even if you didn't want to be here in the first place.{break}{mood:default}I need to go and water my plants. I'll see you tomorrow.
{mood:awkward}Oh, this is terrifying...{break}But... I'm holding it! And I'm okay!!{break}{mood:happy}Look at me! I'm so brave!{break}Thank you!!!
I should get back to it.

{mood:sad}Yeah, it was a really long week at the shop.{break}Really quiet, too. I don't like when it's quiet.{break}{mood:default}I end up feeling guilty that I'm not doing anything, even though it's not my fault...{break}And then I use up a ton of emotional energy just WORRYING.{break}{mood:laugh}*yawn*{break}{mood:like}Sorry. It's late! I'm usually in bed by 9pm.{break}I'm a morning owl.{break}{mood:dislike}No, wait, that's not it. Morning... bird? Morning... crab?{break}What wakes up early?
Oh, I'm really not the best person to give these to.{break}I can't craft, like, at all.{break}Thanks anyway, but it just seems like a waste!
{mood:awkward}There are some things it's okay to be scared of.{break}This is one of those.{break}I'm just going to put this down... and go and cry a bit.
Have a wonderful day, dear.{random}Love you!
Are you trying to end the date early?
{mood:awkward}Um... I don't want to make things awkward, but...{break}{mood:sad}I waited ages for you to turn up to our date. Where were you?
Hi!!!!{random}I missed you!{random}There's my favourite person!{random}Hiiii!!!

{mood:laugh}Well, it is now.{break}{mood:like}I mean, maybe most peopl-{break}{mood:happy}EARLY BIRD. It's early bird.{break}{mood:like}A "lark". That's what my mom used to say.{break}{mood:default}I don't know if larks exist any more, though.{break}Or crabs, actually.{break}I mean, they don't exist up here, which makes sense. How would a crab get up here?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm getting off topic, sorry.{break}{mood:like}I was going to say that this has been a lovely date, but I need to get to bed!
Bye!!!{random}See you later, cutie!{random}I love you!

{mood:laugh}Yes, that's it!{break}{mood:like}My mom also used to call me a "lark".{break}I guess larks were also morning owls. Early birds.{break}{mood:default}But they don't exist up here. Maybe it's too high up for them?{break}{mood:laugh}I'm getting off topic, sorry.{break}{mood:happy}I just think birds are cool. We mostly get seagulls up here.{break}{mood:laugh}Sorry, I got off topic again!{break}I feel like I spent this whole date talking. I'm sorry!{break}{mood:like}I would like to, um, do this again though. If you want.{break}{mood:happy}I promise I'll be better rested next time!

{mood:awkward}I, um... I wasn't trying to end it early, it's just...{break}{mood:sad}I'm sorry. I'm just super tired from working all day.{break}{mood:default}I'm much better company when I'm not all out of energy, I promise!{break}So, yeah, I think I need to go to bed, sorry...{break}...But maybe we can do this again another time?
{mood:sad}Oh, okay.{break}It took me ages to get up the courage to actually go...

{mood:happy}Have I mentioned to you that I dabble in witchcraft?{break}{mood:like}Waldo taught me some before he... left.{break}There's one spell that uses ingredients from around here.{break}Let's see if I can remember what they were...{break}{npc:up}One sinistral shell...{break}{npc:down}One cup of sea water...{break}{npc:right}One six-legged starfish...{break}{mood:happy}And then you brew the whole thing under the light of a full moon.{break}Lucky us, the moon is full tonight!{break}{mood:like}Okay... it's ready...
{mood:happy}It's my birthday today.{break}How old am I? I'll never tell!{break}{mood:laugh}Also I can't remember.
Okay, so I just drink the whole thing like this?
{mood:happy}This is a great birthday present, wow!{break}I hope I can use it soon!
{mood:awkward}Um... did you... bring a gift receipt?

{mood:awkward}Whoa, no, wait!{break}...{break}It's... it's supposed to be a body lotion. You don't drink it.{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, listen, I don't want to encourage you, but that was incredible.{break}{mood:happy}I mean, everything's an adventure to you!{break}{mood:laugh}But, uh, we should get you to Ofelia.{break}Drinking that much seawater is a baaaad idea.{break}{mood:like}You'll be fine... but she'll be able to rehydrate you so you don't feel awful tomorrow.{break}Come on, I'll take you to Ofelia's house... Let's hope she's still up!

{mood:happy}Oh, it's a body lotion!{break}The ingredients maaagically break down to make this thick gel.{break}Isn't it cool? It's like magic...{break}{mood:laugh}But it's actually science!{break}{mood:like}Zed told me it's something to do with a chemical in the shell and the starfish.{break}{mood:happy}Anyway, you can keep it if you want!{break}{mood:like}You ready to head back? I think I am.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet
I'd love to learn to fish. It looks relaxing.

{mood:dislike}I didn't ask you to!{break}{mood:default}It's a body lotion.{break}I guess it's fine if you don't want it.{break}I could always use a refill anyway.{break}Come on, let's head home. It's getting cold.
{mood:like}Is that a Moonstone Bracelet? It's very nice.{break}{mood:awkward}Wait, are you asking me out?!

So, I was going to ask if there was, um...{break}{mood:laugh}If there's anywhere else you'd want to go on a date?{break}{mood:like}It's not that I don't like the beach. Or the dates!{break}It's just that I don't tend to come to the beach much, mostly because of the-{break}{mood:awkward}YEP RIGHT THERE, LOOK{break}THAT SORT OF GOOEY... THING ON THE SAND{break}I HATE IT{break}IS IT MOVING?!{break}AAAAAA CAN YOU GET RID OF IT PLEASE
{mood:awkward}Oh no. I think I left my front door unlocked...
Step aside, your hero has arrived.
{mood:love}Yes, yes, yes, YES!!{break}This is the best day.
{mood:laugh}Oh, haha... yeah... that would be... terrible.{break}{mood:happy}I was just kidding.{break}{mood:default}...Um, I have to go.
{mood:awkward}I swear I just saw a mouse.{break}{mood:default}We don't even get mice up here...

{mood:awkward}....{break}IS IT GONE?{break}{mood:laugh}Thank you. You really are a hero.{break}{mood:like}I feel like such a dork, but ugh, I can't STAND seaweed.{break}{mood:dislike}Even just... THINKING about it. Ugh. So slimy.{break}{mood:default}I can't explain it.. but I appreciate your understanding.{break}{mood:laugh}I think most people would just call me crazy and leave.{break}{mood:like}Maybe next time, let's go on a date to somewhere with less... seaweed in it.
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet

{mood:awkward}YEAH THE SEAWEED{break}THE SLIMY HORRIBLE STUFF{break}PLEASE CAN YOU JUST BURY IT OR THROW IT INTO THE SEA{break}SORRY I PROMISE I'M NOT WEIRD{break}MAYBE A LITTLE BIT WEIRD{break}...{break}IS IT GONE?{break}{mood:sad}Okay, thank you. Ugh. Sorry.{break}I just... can't stand the stuff. It's irrational, I know.{break}{mood:default}I just imagine what it would feel like on my skin, and... blegh. Nasty.{break}{mood:like}But thank you for, um... helping me.{break}{mood:laugh}Maybe next time, let's go on a date to somewhere with less... seaweed in it.
{mood:sad}Oh... I'm not sure I'm ready for that. Sorry.
{mood:awkward}SORRY I KNOW IT'S SILLY{break}I CAN'T HELP IT{break}AHHHH IT JUST MOVED{break}{npc:up}I HAVE TO GO{break}SORRY{break}BYE{break}SORRY
What's it like in those dungeons?{break}{mood:laugh}Dark and scary? Knew it.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
Don't treat the other Spirits too harshly.{break}{mood:sad}They can't help their current state.
I had a weird dream last night.{break}I can't really remember it, though.

So, um... I hope this isn't awkward, but...{break}{mood:laugh}I don't really drink, so I was a bit worried about coming here on a date.{break}{mood:default}Well... I say I don't really drink... I mean I don't drink at all.{break}{mood:laugh}I don't drink alcohol, I mean! Other liquids are fine.{break}{mood:awkward}I hope that's not weird for you.
{mood:dislike}Fish are beautiful. From a distance.{break}They have creepy eyes.
No! I don't want to break up with you!
{mood:sad}I think I caught some sun yesterday.
We can go somewhere else for a date if you want!
{mood:sad}...I understand.{break}I'm sorry I couldn't keep up with you.{break}I'm going to need some time... before we can be friends again.
This week has been a long one.
I mean, it's weird at a tavern.
{mood:dislike}Why would you show me the break up thing, then?{break}{mood:sad}I really thought that this was the end...{break}{mood:default}I'm glad it's not. But don't do that again!

{mood:laugh}Thank you!{break}{mood:like}Honestly, some people act like you're a freak for not drinking.{break}And you end up having to explain yourself all the time, which is tiring.{break}{mood:sad}It sometimes makes social events really hard.{break}But everyone who lives here is cool with it, and they always have soft drinks at parties.{break}{mood:laugh}I think Tobin's sad I'll never try his moonshine...{break}Even if I DID drink, I don't know that I'd want to try it!{break}{mood:like}But seriously, thank you, again.{break}{mood:happy}I'm glad you understand.
{mood:like}Man, I love the colours of the leaves.{break}Nothing else looks like fall does.

{mood:laugh}No, no, it's okay!{break}{mood:like}I got used to being surrounded by alcohol a long time ago.{break}It's not ideal, but it's perfectly fine.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you for checking, though.{break}{mood:like}I don't mind where we are... I'm just happy to be on these dates with you!
Your garden looks lovely, by the way.

{mood:awkward}I guess so... but... there's not many other places to go on the island...{break}{mood:sad}I promise we can still have fun here.{break}{mood:default}I just won't get tipsy!{break}So... please don't let this stop you from wanting to go out again.{break}{mood:like}I'm really enjoying this date, even totally sober!
Oh, I was actually just wondering...{break}{mood:like}Would you like to watch the fireworks... with me?{break}{mood:laugh}You don't have to say yes if you don't want to!
Have you ever fallen off your broom?{break}I hope not. You'd totally die, and we'd never find out.
It feels like it's Friday already.

I'd like to ask you something.{break}You seem so at ease with everyone on Moonstone Island.{break}And it's not that I'm not friends with them...{break}It's just that it's really hard for me to be social.{break}{mood:sad}I mean, it can be exhausting! And I'm scared I'll get it wrong.{break}{mood:default}How do you do it?
This perhaps won't surprise you, but...{break}{mood:laugh}This outfit is not terribly warm.
Most people want someone who just listens.
{mood:happy}Oh, amazing! Okay!{break}I'm so relieved you said yes... I've been psyching myself up all day to ask!
I tell them what they want to hear.
{mood:awkward}I'm standing over here because I thought I saw a spider.

{mood:laugh}Yeah, I've noticed that you're quiet.{break}{mood:default}But I can be quiet, too. In a bad way.{break}I don't know. Maybe I'm being too hard on myself.{break}{mood:like}But maybe... maybe you can teach me how to be a good listener, some time?
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest), Rowan will always accept

{mood:laugh}But that's the whole problem!{break}{mood:like}I have no idea what people want to hear.{break}{mood:default}Social situations are like a puzzle that everyone else has figured out.{break}And I'm trying to keep up... but I don't know how!{break}{mood:happy}I'll just try to keep learning from you by osmosis!

Is this... my Spirit?{break}I... I don't know what to say...{break}{mood:happy}I love them so much!{break}I've never had anyone do something like this for me before, Alchemist. You're wonderful. Thank you!{break}{mood:like}Oh, and... everyone chipped in to get you a special gift to show our appreciation.{break}{mood:laugh}It's, uh, it's just a small token. I hope you like them!
Have you been adventuring at night?{break}{mood:laugh}You're either courageous or mad.

{mood:sad}Maybe not for you, but it is for me.{break}I guess if you don't know what it's like to be socially anxious, you can't help.{break}Well, I'll just keep trying to figure it out.{break}{mood:default}Thanks anyway.
{mood:sad}I'm so hungry. But I already ate...
{mood:like}Thank you for sorting this out for me! I appreciate it.{break}Don't worry, I'm going to pay you for your time. Here you go!
I can't wait for spring to come again.

I saw you flying over the island the other day!{break}{mood:laugh}I cannot believe how much courage you must have.{break}{mood:like}Seriously! I wish I had an ounce of your bravery.{break}Moving here, starting over, fighting spirits, flying... it's really cool.{break}How did you get so brave?
{mood:sad}I'm not feeling so good today.{break}I think it's just seasonal depression.
I just did things I was scared of until I wasn't scared any more.
It's so cold today! How are you not shivering?
So, how does fishing work around here?{break}{mood:laugh}I mean, don't the fish just fall off the edge?
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met

{mood:happy}Wait, really?{break}{mood:like}I guess I've always assumed bravery is something you're born with.{break}Maybe it's like confidence. Fake it 'til you make it, right?{break}I'm not confident either, though!{break}Maybe I can give it a go. Try scary things, until I'm not scared.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm scared of trying scary things, so this can be the first step!
{mood:awkward}Is that... an engagement ring? Are you proposing?!

{mood:laugh}I don't think that's true!{break}{mood:like}No, you're not stupid.{break}{mood:laugh}If you were stupid, you'd have jumped off with no balloon or broom or anything!{break}{mood:like}I admire you. I wish I were more like you.{break}Maybe one day... you can teach me how to be brave, too.
I hope you're having a wonderful morning.{break}{mood:like}It's spring, at last!

Oh, I see.{break}Yeah... I guess I understand.{break}There's not a lot going on here, so you go to other islands, right?{break}I guess some of us are more content with a quiet life.{break}Well, maybe I just need to get more bored.{break}...I think I might head home, actually.
Oh, no, don't worry! This isn't for you...
It's quite nice to have a new person in town.

{mood:happy}YES! Yes, of course that's okay!{break}I'm sorry... for being anxious, it's just... I've dreamed about this, and I can't believe it's real!{break}{mood:love}And my answer is yes, of course. Yes, yes!
Ossono has told me I should talk to you more.{break}{mood:awkward}I hope I haven't been rude.
Sorry I'm late. I lost track of time doing inventory.{break}{mood:like}So... you said you had something to tell me?
{mood:sad}Oh, right, sorry. I shouldn't have assumed... Sorry.
You've met Tobin, right?{break}{mood:happy}Isn't he great?
I have something to SHOW you.
You should make sure to come to the tavern on Fridays, by the way.
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
{mood:laugh}You've probably noticed by now, but... I'm quite shy.{break}{mood:like}So, thanks for coming over and talking to me.{break}I've been wanting to get to know you!
You have something in your teeth.
{mood:awkward}Oh, uh, I don't know how to say this without hurting your feelings...{break}{mood:laugh}I don't think I'm ready for marriage just yet! Sorry!
{mood:like}Spring showers bring summer flowers.{break}{mood:laugh}At least, I hope.

You have something to -{break}{mood:awkward}OH NO WHAT IS THAT{break}WHY IS IT WIGGLING{break}IS IT ALIVE{break}{npc:right}WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS{break}TO MAKE ME BRAVE???{break}OH I GET IT{break}{npc:left}THAT'S REALLY THOUGHTFUL OF YOU{break}I'M FEELING REALLY BRAVE RIGHT NOW ACTUALLY{break}MOSTLY BECAUSE I AM NOT RUNNING AWAY OR FAINTING{break}HOWEVER I AM GOING TO GO HOME NOW{break}BUT I NEED YOU TO KNOW{break}THAT I REALLY APPRECIATED YOU DOING THIS{break}SO THIS IS NOT A REFLECTION ON HOW MUCH I LIKE YOU{break}{npc:right}OKAY BYE SORRY BYE
{mood:dislike}Oh, if you see Ossono, tell her to stop pranking Quill.{break}{mood:sad}Poor guy keeps coming into my shop looking for things that don't exist...

{mood:awkward}Oh! Uh!!!{break}I think, I think I'm not... I'm not ready to, um...{break}{mood:sad}It's not that I don't enjoy our dates...{break}I just, well, I'm not ready to say... that.{break}{mood:like}But... I really like you.{break}{mood:love}And it means a lot that... you feel that way about me.{break}Thank you.
{mood:like}Hey, you did it! You did the marry thing! Great job!{break}{mood:laugh}Haha, sorry, I've never been to a wedding. I have no idea what you're supposed to say!
I'm getting a new delivery in next week, hopefully.{break}We don't get deliveries often all the way out here.

{mood:awkward}Oh! That's... that's what you wanted to say?{break}{npc:up}Okay, um... there. It should be gone.{break}{mood:sad}{npc:left}Oh, that's so embarrassing.{break}{mood:default}...You know, I'm... I'm not feeling well, actually.{break}I think... I'll just call it a night. Sorry.
{mood:like}Oh, by the way, if you're looking for plants, try the Conservatory. I only sell seeds.{break}{mood:laugh}I doubt I could keep the plants alive long enough to sell them!
{mood:love}I don't want this night to end... but I also want you just to myself.{break}Shall we go home?
{mood:laugh}The cataclysm really made some of our jobs very hard.{break}{mood:happy}But hey! At least we get some benefits, right?{break}Like, um... like being closer to space!
{mood:awkward}Please tell me you're not thinking of flying in this weather?!

You know, this is only the second time I've come to the hot springs.{break}{mood:laugh}The first time, I didn't even get in!{break}{mood:default}I was expecting to be alone, but Ofelia and Gaiana were there, and I just... wanted to be alone.{break}So I left before they could see me.{break}{mood:laugh}I'm still kinda nervous to be here with you, to be honest.{break}{mood:default}It took me all day to psych myself up...
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
{mood:happy}Your Spirits are so cute.{break}{mood:like}It must be really fun to run around with them all day.
We can close our eyes, if it helps!
Did you need something from the shop?{break}{mood:awkward}Sorry! It's my day off!

{mood:awkward}Hey, Alchemist... I didn't realise this rift thing was, uh, so terrifying?{break}I asked Cleo about it and now I'm pretty sure I'm gonna have nightmares tonight.{break}{mood:sad}I'm really glad you fixed it... but I'm also super scared it'll happen again...
Are you afraid of hot water, too?
You might not see me outside as much now that it's summer.{break}{mood:laugh}I have to be careful, or I burn like a marshmallow!

{mood:like}I know it's silly, but...{break}That would actually make me feel a lot better.{break}At least for this first time.{break}{mood:laugh}I want to be able to enjoy this time with you without anxiety draining all the fun away.{break}{mood:like}So, yeah... let's close our eyes. Ready?
{mood:like}Oh, Stonefruit Donuts! These are my favourite.{break}{mood:awkward}That's not too basic and boring, is it?
You've caught the sun on your cheeks a little bit.{break}{mood:love}It's very cute.

{mood:laugh}I mean... I know!{break}{mood:like}There are a lot of things I don't NEED to worry about.{break}I know it's not rational, and I know it's annoying.{break}{mood:laugh}I know that better than anyone, actually!{break}{mood:default}I can't help it, though.{break}So... do you mind if we just spend a few more minutes here?{break}Maybe next time I can be a tiny bit braver.
{mood:like}Are you looking for anything in particular?

{mood:sad}I must seem ridiculous.{break}I'm not afraid of water, no, just... being seen, I guess.{break}{mood:awkward}I mean, being in, erm, intimate situations.{break}{mood:sad}Sorry.{break}I think I have to get out, actually. The anxiety is a bit too much.
{mood:awkward}WHY IS NO ONE FREAKING OUT THAT THERE'S BEEN A GOD IN THE HOT SPRING THIS WHOLE TIME?!{break}{mood:like}Maybe... maybe you could stay here by my side in case anything, um, goes wrong?
Did you know that I invented that inventory slot of yours?{break}{mood:laugh}I should really be more confident about my creations!
Ossono shows me what's in your Sell Crate, sometimes.{break}{mood:like}I get first pick of the items inside!

Hey, so... I'm sorry about being weird last time.{break}{mood:sad}And I'm sorry that I've ruined so many of our dates.{break}And I'm sorry I'm ruining this one by being sorry, too.{break}{mood:angry}Why can't I just be normal?!{break}{mood:dislike}Why can't I just be brave and not anxious like everyone else?{break}{mood:sad}I wish I was better. You deserve better than this.
{mood:dislike}Before you arrived, a pretty significant chunk broke off the island.{break}It happens every now and again. Just... be careful.
Courage isn't the absence of fear. It's finding something more important than fear.

{mood:like}I like the bit when the Spirits fly in front of the moon. It's really neat.{break}{mood:laugh}I can't imagine what it's like to migrate every year, though! I hate moving!{break}{mood:like}I'd like it if you wanted to watch it all with me, if you want to...
{mood:awkward}I think my shoulders are sunburned...{break}{mood:sad}This happens every time I come out here. Why don't I learn?!
You don't need to apologise for who you are.
I hope you're taking enough supplies with you when you go out.{break}{mood:awkward}Uh, not that I'm trying to force you to buy more stuff!
{mood:awkward}I'm always just a LITTLE bit scared that one day this island will fall down.{break}{mood:sad}Zed says it won't, but... still...

I think... maybe I have that.{break}Something more important than fear, I mean.{break}{mood:like}It's... you.{break}I guess, in a way... I'm being brave by being here at all, right?{break}Because not being around you is worse than how scary it is to feel this way.{break}{mood:love}You're so wise, you know.{break}No wonder I like you so much.{break}{mood:sad}Just... I hope you can be patient with me.
I'm... not great at cooking, actually.{break}{mood:like}So I got Ofelia's help! I won't win, but at least I won't feel like I failed!
You came to the tavern!{break}{mood:like}You're welcome to sit with me, if you'd like.{break}{mood:laugh}No pressure, sorry!

{mood:sad}I know... I mean... I know that, rationally.{break}But it just doesn't... help.{break}I get stuck in a horrible spiral of guilt and fear and apologies.{break}{mood:default}But I'm trying. I really am.{break}{mood:like}Because I want to try... for you.{break}I want to be better, so I can stop... feeling this way.{break}{mood:love}Because behind all the fear is something warm and wonderful.{break}I want to feel that way all the time. But I have to push past the fear.{break}{mood:default}I'll just have to keep trying.{break}I hope you can be patient with me.
I wish it was easier to get salt up here.{break}{mood:sad}It's the little things you take for granted.
